column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Every time I have to go to the city , I have to take the train .
#id=2
#text=One day , when I was on the train , I had to wait twenty minutes for the next train to arrive .
#id=3
#text=When it arrived , , the place was full .
#id=4
#text=It was full because it was rush hour .
#id=5
#text=That 's the time when everyone is coming out of work or school .
#id=6
#text=I could n't find a seat at all !
#id=7
#text=I had to stand up throughout my whole ride .
#id=8
#text=It was very uncomfortable because I had to stand up for an hour ride .
#id=9
#text=To make matters worse , more people wanted to squeeze inside the train .
#text=Now everybody was on top of one another .
#text=Soon , the train could n't move anymore because there were just too many people on the train .
#text=The door would n't close therefore ; the conductor could n't drive the train .
#text=Eventually , people started to come out and I was able to breathe .
#text=Finally , I reached my stop and was relieved to be out of that train .
